TypeSignature.Value: public class Frame : System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl, System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild, System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
.class public auto ansi Frame extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild, class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class Frame Inherits ContentControl Implements IAddChild, IUriContext
public ref class Frame : System::Windows::Controls::ContentControl, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext

summary.span: 框架是一种支持导航的内容控件。

span.span: Frame is a content control that supports navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是提供能够导航到并显示内容的内容控件。 is a content control that provides the ability to navigate to and display content. 可以与其他控件和元素承载于其他内容。 can be hosted within other content, as with other controls and elements. > [!CAUTION] > 当控件导航到 HTML 内容控件内部实例化本机 WebBrowser ActiveX 控件。When the control navigates to HTML content, the control internally instantiates the native WebBrowser ActiveX control. WPF 通过将功能控制应用于的 WebBrowser ActiveX 控件中启用安全功能。WPF enables security features by applying feature controls to the WebBrowser ActiveX control. 应用的功能控件不同于 Xbap 和独立应用程序。The feature controls that are applied differ for XBAPs and stand-alone applications. 某些应用程序应该应用附加功能控制以防止运行恶意内容。Some applications should apply additional feature controls to prevent malicious content from running. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"web 浏览器控件和功能控件"一节[安全性 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)和[WebBrowser 控件概述和教程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=179388)。For more information, see the "WebBrowser Control and Feature Controls" section in [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md) and [WebBrowser Control Overviews and Tutorials](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=179388). 内容可以是任何类型的.NET Framework 对象和 HTML 文件。Content can be any type of .NET Framework object and HTML files. 一般情况下，但是，页面是首选导航的包内容的方式 (请参阅)。In general, however, pages are the preferred the way to package content for navigation (see ). 通过设置情况下，内容可以导航到的所需内容的 uri 的属性。Content can be navigated to by setting the property with the URI for the desired content. 此外，内容可以导航到使用的以下重载之一方法：Additionally, content can be navigated to by using one of the following overloads of the method: - - 通过 URI，导航到内容返回包含内容的对象。When content is navigated to by URI, returns an object that contains the content. 或者，内容可以导航到使用之一接受对象的方法重载：Alternatively, content can be navigated to by using one of the method overloads that accepts an object: - - 导航的生存期可以跟踪通过以下事件：The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - - - - - - - 并非所有事件都引发发生导航; 每次（取消、 已停止，或失败），将由导航发生 （内容或内容片段） 和如何完成导航的类型确定的一套引发的事件。Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed). 下图说明了这些事件的激发顺序的序列：The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events will fire: ![页面导航流程图](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "页面导航流程图")![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") 期间或之后导航窗格中，提供信息，其中包括要导航到内容的 URI 导航目标的内容 ()，当前内容的 URI ()，并包含的对象导航到的内容 ()。During or after a navigation, provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the URI of the content being navigated to (), the URI of the current content (), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (). 在内容导航到时,导航历史记录中记录为条目的导航。When content is navigated to, records the navigation as an entry in navigation history. 添加一个条目后退导航历史记录，新导航时，通过调用方法，或通过导航到前进导航历史记录中的项通过调用。An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling . 条目添加到前进导航历史记录上，通过导航到条目后退导航历史记录，通过调用。An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling . 和报告是否存在条目后退和前进导航历史记录，分别。 and report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively. 第一次一段的内容导航到另一段内容，从会自动显示导航用户界面，使用户能够向后导航并前进导航历史记录。The first time that one piece of content is navigated to from another piece of content, automatically displays a navigation UI that allows users to navigate back and forward through navigation history. 你可以配置导航 UI 会在显示时通过设置属性。You can configure when the navigation UI is shown by setting the property. 默认情况下，仅当父导航器将使用其自己的导航历史记录 (， ) 无法找到其自己的导航历史记录。By default, will use its own navigation history only if a parent navigator (, ) with its own navigation history cannot be found. 这意味着，帧的导航历史记录条目混合在一起导航历史记录条目与为父导航器。This means that navigation history entries for the frame are mingled with navigation history entries for the parent navigator. 若要指定管理其自己导航历史记录中，设置属性。To specify that a manages its own navigation history, set the property to . 最新条目后退导航历史记录可能会通过调用。The most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling . 不导航历史记录中存储内容的对象的实例。 does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history. 相反，创建使用导航历史记录导航到每次的内容对象的新实例。Instead, creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history. 此行为旨在时较大数字和大片的内容要导航到避免过多的内存消耗。This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to. 因此，内容的状态将不会保留从一个导航到下一步。Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next. 但是，WPF 提供了几种方法，使您可以导航历史记录中存储的一段内容的状态。However, WPF provides several techniques by which you can store a state for a piece of content in navigation history. 使用，您还可以保留多个集的单个页面实例的状态。Using , you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance. ## 自定义框架控件Customizing the Frame Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 你可以修改默认提供独特外观的控件。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和特定于状态，请参阅[框架样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/frame-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Frame Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/frame-styles-and-templates.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 设置 visual 属性会仅造成影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并通过设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个简单控件并指定要加载从 URI 使用的初始源内容属性。The following example shows how to create a simple control and specify initial source content to load from a URI using the property. [!code-xaml[FrameSnippets#SetFrameSourceXAML1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#setframesourcexaml1)] [!code-xaml[FrameSnippets#SetFrameSourceXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#setframesourcexaml2)] [!code-xaml[FrameSnippets#SetFrameSourceXAML3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#setframesourcexaml3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Navigation::JournalOwnership JournalOwnership { System::Windows::Navigation::JournalOwnership get(); void set(System::Windows::Navigation::JournalOwnership value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 是负责管理自己的导航历史记录，还是将导航历史记录的管理工作交给父导航器 (、) 负责。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a is responsible for managing its own navigation history, or yields navigation history management to a parent navigator (, ).

value.span: 一个 值，该值指定 是否管理自己的日记。

span.span: A value that specifies whether manages its own journal.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，仅当父导航主机将使用其自己的导航历史记录 (， ) 找不到与它自己的日志 (例如，如果由承载的内容中承载)。By default, will use its own navigation history only if a parent navigation host (, ) with its own journal cannot be found (for example, if a is hosted in content that is hosted by a ). 若要强制要管理其自己的导航历史记录，将设置到。To force to manage its own navigation history, set to . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示配置为使用其自己的导航历史记录。The following example illustrates a that is configured to use its own navigation history. [!code-xaml[FrameJournalOwnershipSnippetSample#SetJournalOwnershipProperty](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameJournalOwnershipSnippetSample/CS/HomePage.xaml#setjournalownershipproperty)]

summary.span: 异步导航到包含在某个对象中的内容。

span.span: Navigates asynchronously to content that is contained by an object.

returns.span: 如果未取消导航，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅 。See . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何导航到包含在某个对象的内容。The following example shows how to navigate to content that is contained by an object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用为托管内容导航提供支持。 uses to support navigation for hosted content. 可用于承载代码可获取对引用。 is useful for code that hosts a to get a reference to the . 由承载的内容，如，应使用或获取对引用。Content that is hosted by a , such as , should use or to get a reference to the . > [!NOTE] > 不返回对相同的引用与调用并传递未。 does not return a reference to the same as calling and passing does. 前者返回由拥有而后者返回导航到在其中的内容导航主机承载。The former returns the that is owned by the while the latter returns the for the navigation host that navigated to the content in which the is hosted. 下面的代码演示了差异。The following code demonstrates the differences. [!code-csharp[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#nsframediffcode1)] [!code-vb[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#nsframediffcode1)] [!code-csharp[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#nsframediffcode2)] [!code-vb[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#nsframediffcode2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Navigation::NavigationUIVisibility NavigationUIVisibility { System::Windows::Navigation::NavigationUIVisibility get(); void set(System::Windows::Navigation::NavigationUIVisibility value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 何时可以显示其导航 UI。

span.span: Gets or sets when the can show its navigation UI.

value.span: A值，该值指定当可以显示其导航用户界面。

span.span: A value that specifies when the can show its navigation UI.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，自动显示其导航用户界面时的第一个条目添加到导航历史记录。By default, a shows its navigation UI automatically when the first entry is added to navigation history. 导航用户界面随后保持可见，并会后退或向前导航按钮变得相应地启用或禁用以反映的项数后退和前进导航历史记录。The navigation UI subsequently remains visible, with the back or forward navigation buttons becoming appropriately enabled or disabled to reflect the number of entries in back and forward navigation history. 你可以确保导航 UI 始终可见通过设置：You can ensure that navigation UI is always visible by setting: 1. 至 to 2. 至 to 你设置到如果你想要隐藏导航用户界面。You set to if you want to hide the navigation UI. 这可能是这种情况，当导航用户界面不会从显示的内容的意义上，或者是因为你要提供自己导航用户界面。This might be the case when navigation UI doesn’t make sense with the content you are displaying from a , or because you are providing your own navigation UI. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确保的导航镶边将始终显示通过设置到。The following example demonstrates how to make sure the navigation chrome of a is always visible by setting to . [!code-csharp[FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets#SetNavigationUIVisibility](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#setnavigationuivisibility)] [!code-vb[FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets#SetNavigationUIVisibility](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#setnavigationuivisibility)] [!code-xaml[FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets#SetNavigationUIVisibility](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets/XAML/Window1.xaml#setnavigationuivisibility)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SandboxExternalContent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 是否在一个部分信任的安全沙盒（具有默认的 权限集）中隔离外部 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 内容。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a isolates external [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content within a partial trust security sandbox (with the default permission set).

value.span: 如果在一个部分信任的安全沙盒中隔离内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if content is isolated within a partial trust security sandbox; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 外部内容是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]未附随一个应用程序作为资源文件或内容文件的内容 (请参阅[WPF 应用程序资源、 内容和数据文件](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md))。External content is [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] content that is not included with an application as either a resource file or a content file (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)). 当是`true`，和内容的源是外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]文件时，内容加载到仅限于默认值的部分信任安全沙盒`Internet`权限集。When is `true`, and the source for the content of the is an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, the content is loaded into a partial trust security sandbox that is limited to the default `Internet` permission set. 外部内容随后加载到单独的进程。The external content is subsequently loaded into a separate process. 因此，外部的内容将被隔离，不能应用程序范围内的资源，例如资源字典的访问 (请参阅)。As a result, the external content becomes isolated and does not have access to application-scope resources, such as resource dictionaries (see ). > [!NOTE] > 将仅包含外部内容时属性设置为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]为外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]文件。 will only contain external content when the property is set to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file. 使用提供的内容属性被视为内部内容，并随后，不会被隔离。 content that is provided using the property is considered internal content and, subsequently, is not isolated. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

exception.span: 当应用程序在部分信任的环境中执行时，将设置 。

span.span: is set when an application is executing in partial trust.
